metaTitle: VILLAS VICTORIA Fuente Álamo | Luxury Villas from €279,900
metaDescription: Discover VILLAS VICTORIA in Fuente Álamo, Murcia. Modern 2-3 bed villas from €279,900 by ORBIOS. Golf resort living, delivery 2027. Buy now.

content.heroIntro: Welcome to VILLAS VICTORIA, an exceptional residential development by ORBIOS situated in the prestigious Hacienda Del Alamo Golf resort in Fuente Álamo, Murcia. These stunning modern villas represent the pinnacle of Spanish coastal living, offering 2-3 spacious bedrooms with built sizes ranging from 93 to 155 square meters, all available from just €279,900. Located within one of the region's most sought-after golf communities, VILLAS VICTORIA combines contemporary architectural design with premium finishes and exclusive amenities. This is an outstanding opportunity to invest in a new-build property in a thriving international community, with completion scheduled for January 1st, 2027. Whether you're seeking a primary residence, holiday home, or investment property with strong rental potential, VILLAS VICTORIA delivers exceptional value. The development is perfectly positioned for buyers who appreciate high-quality construction, modern living standards, and the lifestyle benefits of a world-class golf resort destination. With an established international community where English is widely spoken, VILLAS VICTORIA welcomes discerning buyers from around the world.

locationSection.intro: Hacienda Del Alamo Golf is one of Spain's most prestigious residential communities, nestled in the heart of Fuente Álamo in the Murcia region. This exclusive golf resort community offers a harmonious blend of championship golf, luxury living, and Mediterranean lifestyle. The area has become increasingly popular with international buyers seeking quality properties in a safe, well-established environment with excellent infrastructure. Fuente Álamo itself is a charming inland town that has successfully balanced growth with community character, attracting expats and Spanish residents alike. The Hacienda Del Alamo Golf development features world-class amenities, manicured landscapes, and a strong sense of community. Being part of this established resort means residents enjoy access to multiple championship golf courses, fine dining restaurants, and boutique shopping. The region benefits from excellent healthcare facilities, with a regional hospital just 30 minutes away and private clinics offering English-speaking doctors. Families appreciate the proximity to international schools featuring British curriculum options, making this an ideal location for relocating families.
highlights: Beach: Multiple Blue Flag beaches within 20 minutes drive
Golf: Several championship courses within resort and nearby
Hospital: Regional hospital within 30 minutes, private clinics available
Shopping: Mercadona, Lidl, Consum, and local markets nearby
Restaurants: Fine dining at resort and local establishments in Fuente Álamo

propertyFeatures.intro: VILLAS VICTORIA represents the highest standards of contemporary Spanish villa construction. Each property has been meticulously designed by ORBIOS with attention to quality materials, energy efficiency, and modern living standards. The villas feature open-plan living spaces that maximize natural light and seamless indoor-outdoor transitions, perfect for the Mediterranean lifestyle. Construction includes thermally efficient double glazing with thermal break systems, modern air conditioning pre-installation, and premium ceramic flooring throughout. These new-build properties come equipped with fitted kitchens featuring quality appliances, modern bathroom fixtures with quality ceramics, and landscaped private gardens. Each villa includes a private parking space, storage room, and sophisticated video entry system for security and convenience. The communal facilities include a sparkling swimming pool area, adding another dimension to resort living.
features: Fitted kitchen with quality appliances included
Double glazing with thermal break technology
Private parking space for each villa

content.investmentSection: VILLAS VICTORIA represents a compelling investment opportunity in one of Spain's most dynamic property markets. Fuente Álamo has demonstrated consistent growth, with local property values increasing at +8% year-on-year, significantly outpacing broader market trends. These villas are positioned at a remarkable 40% below the pricing of comparable properties in Spanish island markets, offering exceptional value for both owner-occupiers and investors. The rental market is particularly strong, with similar properties in the Hacienda Del Alamo Golf community achieving €800 per week rental income during peak seasons. The combination of golf resort amenities, international community appeal, excellent location between Alicante and Murcia, and emerging status as a premier destination makes VILLAS VICTORIA ideally suited for investment returns. With completion in January 2027, buyers benefit from purchasing at completion prices before the market appreciation that typically follows new-build launches. The established infrastructure, growing international community, and proximity to major amenities provide both stability and growth potential.

faqs.question: What is the price of properties in VILLAS VICTORIA?
faqs.answer: VILLAS VICTORIA villas start from €279,900. The development offers 2-3 bedroom villas ranging from 93 to 155 square meters built size, with plot sizes from 348 to 550 square meters. Contact our team for current availability and specific unit pricing.

faqs.question: When will VILLAS VICTORIA be completed?
faqs.answer: Completion is scheduled for January 1st, 2027. ORBIOS provides a 10-year structural warranty on all properties. We can provide specific delivery timelines and reservation information for interested buyers.

faqs.question: Who is the developer of VILLAS VICTORIA?
faqs.answer: VILLAS VICTORIA is developed by ORBIOS, an established property developer with a strong track record constructing quality homes in Fuente Álamo and the Murcia region. ORBIOS is known for reliable delivery, quality construction, and excellent customer service.

faqs.question: Is Costa Blanca a good place to buy property?
faqs.answer: Yes, Costa Blanca is an excellent investment region. The area combines stunning Mediterranean beaches, established infrastructure, international communities, and strong property appreciation. Fuente Álamo specifically shows +8% year-on-year growth with property values significantly below island markets.

faqs.question: Can foreigners buy property in Spain?
faqs.answer: Yes, foreigners can freely purchase property in Spain without restrictions. Both EU and non-EU citizens can invest in Spanish real estate. You do not require a visa specifically for property purchase, though residency requirements differ. We recommend consulting with a Spanish property lawyer to understand your specific circumstances.

faqs.question: What are the costs of buying property in Spain?
faqs.answer: Beyond the purchase price, expect additional costs including transfer tax (6-10%), notary and registry fees (1-2%), and legal fees (1-2%). Total acquisition costs typically range from 8-14% of the property price. ORBIOS and local professionals can provide detailed cost breakdowns for your specific purchase.

faqs.question: Do I need a visa to buy property in Spain?
faqs.answer: No, you do not need a visa to purchase property in Spain. Property purchase and residency are separate matters. However, if you plan to reside in Spain, you may need a residency visa depending on your nationality. EU citizens have additional rights under EU law.

faqs.question: How much are property taxes in Spain?
faqs.answer: Spain's property-related taxes include: transfer tax (6-10% of purchase price), annual property tax/IBI (0.4-1.1% of cadastral value), and capital gains tax if selling within specific timeframes. Rental income is taxed as personal income. Non-resident property owners pay slightly different rates. Professional advisors can calculate your specific tax obligations.

faqs.question: How far is VILLAS VICTORIA from the beach?
faqs.answer: Multiple Blue Flag beaches are within 20 minutes drive from VILLAS VICTORIA. The Costa Blanca coastline features some of Spain's most beautiful and cleanest beaches, all easily accessible for weekend trips or daily visits during summer months.

faqs.question: What amenities are near VILLAS VICTORIA?
faqs.answer: VILLAS VICTORIA benefits from extensive nearby amenities: shopping at Mercadona, Lidl, and Consum; healthcare at the regional hospital (30 minutes) with English-speaking doctors; championship golf courses within the resort; international schools with British curriculum; and fine dining restaurants throughout the Hacienda Del Alamo Golf community and Fuente Álamo.

content.conclusion: VILLAS VICTORIA by ORBIOS represents a unique opportunity to invest in modern Spanish villa living at an unbeatable price point. Located in the prestigious Hacienda Del Alamo Golf resort in Fuente Álamo, these properties offer the perfect balance of luxury living, investment potential, and Mediterranean lifestyle. With prices from €279,900, strong rental yields, and delivery in January 2027, now is the ideal time to secure your villa before market appreciation accelerates. The established international community, excellent amenities, proximity to beautiful beaches, and championship golf courses create an irresistible proposition for discerning buyers worldwide. Whether you're seeking a primary residence, holiday retreat, or investment property, VILLAS VICTORIA delivers exceptional value and lifestyle benefits. Don't miss this exceptional opportunity—contact us today via WhatsApp or email to discuss your villa requirements, arrange a viewing, or reserve your preferred unit. Our dedicated team is ready to guide you through every step of the purchase process with professional advice and transparent communication.
